resources.string: Very obese = 30.0 or more quite dangerous There is a risk of developing serious illnesses.
Obese = 25.0 - 29.9 obese to some extent Although not considered very fat.
Normal weight, suitable = 18.6 - 24 far from the disease caused by obesity.
Too thin = less than 18.5 underweight is not good.
BMI value from this calculator It is a value for Asians and Thais. This may vary from race to ethnicity.
